title: Optimization of Learning-Based Wireless Network Channel State Information Estimation

context.prior_knowledge: Wireless communication fundamentals, basic deep learning concepts, and matrix operations
context.additional_context: Practical-focused training program for working professionals emphasizing mathematical modeling and algorithm tuning for workplace application

learning_goals: Learners can explain the design principles of CNN encoders that analyze wireless channel characteristics.
Learners can apply hypernetwork parameter adjustment methods via scenario embedding extraction to real-world data.
Learners can quantitatively interpret performance comparison results of the LACE algorithm in multi-scenario environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
